QuestData.Title: Nighttime in the Jungle
QuestData.Description: Nighttime in Stranglethorn is a beautiful thing. The skies fill with stars, and the moon casts its rays right between those leaves, right there. I could stare at these skies all night.$b$bUnfortunately, the trolls that walk the ruins of Zul'Mamwe are interfering with my astronomy. They burn braziers, day and night, which rob me of the darkness I need.$b$bPlease, $n... travel east into Zul'Mamwe and put them out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Put out 8 Zul'Mamwe Braziers at Zul'Mamwe in Northern Stranglethorn.
QuestData.RewardText: I can see the difference already. I can't wait until later tonight, when I get to perform my observations again!
